summary: Experienced AI software development with focus on cutting-edge innovation and team leadership. Proven ability to manage full project lifecycles, from design and development to deployment. Adept at collaborating with internal and external organizations to deliver extraordinary results.

education.degree: Bachelor’s in mathematical and computer science

Work Experiences & Internships.title: Rohde & Schwarz
bullets: Developed a **TCP-based client-server system** that automated overnight Android device testing, handling over **5,000** long-running test cases, and significantly reducing manual testing time by **60%**.
Designed microservice architecture with **gRPC** and Consul to ensure **80%** availability and scalability for up to **100** microservice instances across Linux and Windows environments.

Work Experiences & Internships.title: AV Media
bullets: Developed an interactive AI chatbot to assist over **350 daily visitors** in the Gaia building, with features such as **AI-powered lip-syncing**, realistic **animations**, and audio output.
Built a full-stack webpage built with **React** frameworks to serve as user interface to manage **data retrieval** and **data management** in **Microsoft Azure services**.
Built a **RAG** system based, scalable knowledge base for efficient information retrieval, in less than **0.2s** per request.

Personal Projects.title: StockAI
bullets: Implemented telegram CLI bot to successfully handle more than **10 command types** for stock researching.
Integrated and refined LLM workflows to summarize and analyze data from more than **5000 US companies**.

Personal Projects.title: Personal Portfolio AI Assistant
bullets: Portfolio chatbot that can assist more than **100 visitors** at once in my personal portfolio website.
Using RAG system to retrieve and provide relevant answers for more than **3,000 question types** in less than **2 seconds**.
Implemented helpful functionalities such as navigation and API request sending via function calling, all executed within **1 second** with **90% accuracy**.

Personal Projects.title: Agentic Data Analyst Platform | Final Year Project
bullets: Architected a hierarchical agentic workflow that **autonomously** decomposes complex user queries into executable sub-tasks.
Designed a novel “Bias-Contrastive” analysis layer where distinct AI agents assume **specific analytical personas** to debate findings.
Implemented a “Neutrality Synthesizer” that **mathematically** aggregates divergent agent opinions to filter out subjective noise.

Leadership Experiences.title: ISAR 2025
bullets: Directed all communications with external event organizers and internal AV teams.
Managed a 10-member team in managing all audiovisual and logistical aspects for **large-scale international event**.
Led the entire AV production lifecycle ensuring **100% on-schedule program flow** and resolving issues in less than **5 minutes**.

Leadership Experiences.title: NTU NBS Corporate Support & Facilities
bullets: Led a team of 15 members for fulfilling logistic requests.
Overseen AV team of size **5** for slide production and reception team of size **8** to guarantee memorable event for more than **150** attendees.

skills.Technical: Software design, prompt engineering, Time Series Analysis, RAG Systems, MCP, LLM, Machine Learning, Python, React, Linux (Ubuntu), Git, .NET, gRPC, Cloud & Engineering (Microsoft Azure, AWS, Docker), Microservices, Agile/Scrum, MySQL, ETL, Power BI, Excel.
skills.Soft Skills: Continuous learning, Team leading, Time management, Problem-solving, Continuous learning, Strategic framing , Team leading/organizing, Time management, Team communication/collaboration, Problem-solving, Attention to details, independent working, Proactive, Process-Oriented
